summary: ICP dapp scaffold implemented: Motoko backend canister + React/Vite/Tailwind frontend (with shadcn-ui), including Internet Identity auth, a Rose Scents informational page expanded with rose scent explanations, and the global app background/theme tokens updated to bright_red.

existing_features.title: Core project scaffold (build/deploy template)
existing_features.description: Adds the core repository/build template including Dockerfile, deployment scripts, workspace/package management, and ICP canister configuration files required to build and deploy the app.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister baseline
existing_features.description: Introduces the initial Motoko backend canister (main.mo) with associated canister configuration and generated declaration artifacts to enable frontend integration.

existing_features.title: React frontend baseline with Tailwind + shadcn/ui
existing_features.description: Sets up the React frontend (Vite) with Tailwind styling and shadcn/ui component library integration, including base app entrypoints and project configuration.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Implements Internet Identity authentication support in the frontend via a dedicated hook and associated configuration/lint enforcement for provider usage.

existing_features.title: Backend actor/agent integration hook
existing_features.description: Adds frontend utilities/hooks to create and use a typed backend actor (from generated candid declarations), enabling authenticated or anonymous calls to the backend canister.

existing_features.title: Initial Rose Scents page (frontend feature page)
existing_features.description: Adds an initial feature page for the app (Rose Scents) wired into the React application structure.

existing_features.title: Client-side storage utility
existing_features.description: Introduces a frontend storage client utility for persisting/retrieving client-side data as part of the initial app scaffold.

existing_features.title: Expanded Rose Scents informational content
existing_features.description: Expands the Rose Scents page to explain the scents of different roses as part of the "red roses" project.

existing_features.title: Bright cyan app background theme (via Tailwind/CSS tokens)
existing_features.description: Updates the global Tailwind/CSS theme tokens (including `bg-background` and the document `body`) to render a bright_cyan-based palette in both light and dark modes while maintaining readable contrast for foreground and surfaces.

existing_features.title: Update the global Tailwind/CSS theme tokens in `frontend/src/index.css` so the application background renders as bright_red across the entire app in both the default/light theme (`:root`) and the dark theme (`.dark`) by adjusting the OKLCH CSS variable values for `--background` and any dependent surface/contrast tokens needed to keep text and cards readable, while keeping `body` styled via `@apply bg-background text-foreground`.

architecturalNotes: Project uses an ICP canister setup with a Motoko backend and a React (Vite) frontend; typed candid declarations are generated for frontend consumption.
Frontend uses TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui component primitives; pnpm workspace/build-template tooling is included for repeatable builds and deploys.
Authentication is integrated via Internet Identity with dedicated hooks and lint rules to enforce correct provider usage.
Build template now includes utility scripts for asset hygiene and optimization (e.g., pruning unused images and resizing images) as part of the repeatable build pipeline.
Frontend template includes a broad pre-generated set of shadcn/ui component primitives in the repository for rapid UI assembly.

UI styling includes a global background color configuration set to bright_red (via frontend CSS/Tailwind theme token variables in `frontend/src/index.css`, affecting `bg-background` and `body` in both light and dark mode).
